amendment.description: Amendment to reduce funding for the Botanic Garden by $632,780 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-173 to reduce funding for the Botanic Garden by $632,780 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hayworth amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 299 - 112 (Roll no. 623).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Hayworth.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hayworth amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 299 - 112 (Roll no. 623).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
